title: WHY ARE PEOPLE SUCH JERKS ON HERE????
body: Honestly I don't get it. And I was never afk once besides the 10 sec I took to screen shot this crap. Nor was I toxic in anyway, which is why I'm on here instead of flaming in chat because I refuse to be toxic in game so I have to come here to relieve my mind of this junk. [](https://imgur.com/a/8XW4p) [](https://imgur.com/a/K7iMn) [](https://imgur.com/a/Lbtcf)
